title: Any summoner in OCE got the LCU?
body: Any summoner in OCE got the new alpha client or are they restricting it to NA players? {{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}

replies.body: Nop OCE players accepted too, pretty sure its not restricted to any certain region. I was accepted on 2nd day after release.
Actually yes i made a thread earlier today saying that i got accepted into the LCU this morning and if anyone has any questions to just ask.
